verses.verse: בִּשְׁנַ֣ת <WH8141> year שְׁתַּ֔יִם <WH8147> In the second לְיוֹאָ֥שׁ <WH3101> of Joash בֶּן־ <WH1121> son יוֹאָחָ֖ז <WH3099> of Jehoahaz מֶ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> king יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> of Israel מָלַ֛ךְ <WH4427> reigned אֲמַצְיָ֥הוּ <WH558> Amaziah בֶן־ <WH1121> the son יוֹאָ֖שׁ <WH3101> of Joash מֶ֥לֶךְ <WH4428> king יְהוּדָֽה׃ <WH3063> of Judah

בֶּן־ <WH1121> old עֶשְׂרִ֨ים <WH6242> He was twenty וְחָמֵ֤שׁ <WH2568> and five שָׁנָה֙ <WH8141> years הָיָ֣ה <WH1961> become בְמָלְכ֔וֹ <WH4427> when he began to reign וְעֶשְׂרִ֤ים <WH6242> twenty וָתֵ֙שַׁע֙ <WH8672> and nine שָׁנָ֔ה <WH8141> years מָלַ֖ךְ <WH4427> and reigned בִּירוּשָׁלִָ֑ם <WH3389> in Jerusalem וְשֵׁ֣ם <WH8034> name אִמּ֔וֹ <WH517> And his mother's [יְהֹועַדִּין כ] (יְהֹֽועַדָּ֖ן <WH3086> Jehoaddan ק) מִן־ <WH4480> at יְרוּשָׁלִָֽם׃ <WH3389> of Jerusalem

וַיַּ֤עַשׂ <WH6213> And he did הַיָּשָׁר֙ <WH3477> [that which was] right בְּעֵינֵ֣י <WH5869> in the sight יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> of the LORD רַ֕ק <WH7535> yet לֹ֖א <WH3808> like כְּדָוִ֣ד <WH1732> not like David אָבִ֑יו <WH1> his father כְּכֹ֧ל <WH3605> to all אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> he עָשָׂ֛ה <WH6213> he did יוֹאָ֥שׁ <WH3101> according to all things as Joash אָבִ֖יו <WH1> his father עָשָֽׂה׃ <WH6213> did

רַ֥ק <WH7535> but הַבָּמ֖וֹת <WH1116> Howbeit the high places לֹא־ <WH3808> were not סָ֑רוּ <WH5493> were not taken away ע֥וֹד <WH5750> as yet הָעָ֛ם <WH5971> the people מְזַבְּחִ֥ים <WH2076> did sacrifice וּֽמְקַטְּרִ֖ים <WH6999> and burnt incense בַּבָּמֽוֹת׃ <WH1116> on the high places

וַיְהִ֕י <WH1961> came כַּאֲשֶׁ֛ר <WH834> after חָזְקָ֥ה <WH2388> was confirmed הַמַּמְלָכָ֖ה <WH4467> And it came to pass as soon as the kingdom בְּיָד֑וֹ <WH3027> in his hand וַיַּךְ֙ <WH5221> that he slew אֶת־ <WH853> עֲבָדָ֔יו <WH5650> his servants הַמַּכִּ֖ים <WH5221> which had slain אֶת־ <WH853> הַמֶּ֥לֶךְ <WH4428> the king אָבִֽיו׃ <WH1> his father

וְאֶת־ <WH853> בְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> But the children הַמַּכִּ֖ים <WH5221> of the murderers לֹ֣א <WH3808> nor הֵמִ֑ית <WH4191> he slew כַּכָּת֣וּב <WH3789> not according unto that which is written בְּסֵ֣פֶר <WH5612> in the book תּֽוֹרַת־ <WH8451> of the law מֹ֠שֶׁה <WH4872> of Moses אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> after צִוָּ֨ה <WH6680> commanded יְהוָ֜ה <WH3068> wherein the LORD לֵאמֹ֗ר <WH559> saying לֹא־ <WH3808> nor יוּמְת֨וּ <WH4191> shall not be put to death אָב֤וֹת <WH1> The fathers עַל־ <WH5921> for בָּנִים֙ <WH1121> for the children וּבָנִים֙ <WH1121> nor the children לֹא־ <WH3808> nor יוּמְת֣וּ <WH4191> be put to death עַל־ <WH5921> for אָב֔וֹת <WH1> for the fathers כִּ֛י <WH3588> for אִם־ <WH518> but אִ֥ישׁ <WH376> but every man בְּחֶטְא֖וֹ <WH2399> for his own sin [יָמוּת כ] (יוּמָֽת׃ <WH4191> shall not be put ק)

הוּא־ <WH1931> He הִכָּ֨ה <WH5221> He slew אֶת־ <WH853> אֱד֤וֹם <WH123> of Edom בְּגֵיא־ <WH1516> in the valley [הַמֶּלַח כ] (מֶ֙לַח֙ <WH4417> salt ק) עֲשֶׂ֣רֶת <WH6235> ten אֲלָפִ֔ים <WH505> thousand וְתָפַ֥שׂ <WH8610> and took אֶת־ <WH853> הַסֶּ֖לַע <WH5554> Selah בַּמִּלְחָמָ֑ה <WH4421> by war וַיִּקְרָ֤א <WH7121> and called אֶת־ <WH853> שְׁמָהּ֙ <WH8034> the name יָקְתְאֵ֔ל <WH3371> of it Joktheel עַ֖ד <WH5704> against הַיּ֥וֹם <WH3117> unto this day הַזֶּֽה׃ <WH2088> to this פ

אָ֣ז <WH227> Then שָׁלַ֤ח <WH7971> sent אֲמַצְיָה֙ <WH558> Then Amaziah מַלְאָכִ֔ים <WH4397> messengers אֶל־ <WH413> to יְהוֹאָ֨שׁ <WH3060> to Jehoash בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son יְהוֹאָחָ֧ז <WH3059> of Jehoahaz בֶּן־ <WH1121> son יֵה֛וּא <WH3058> of Jehu מֶ֥לֶךְ <WH4428> king יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> of Israel לֵאמֹ֑ר <WH559> saying לְכָ֖ה <WH1980> Come נִתְרָאֶ֥ה <WH7200> let us look פָנִֽים׃ <WH6440> one another in the face

וַיִּשְׁלַ֞ח <WH7971> sent יְהוֹאָ֣שׁ <WH3060> And Jehoash מֶֽלֶךְ־ <WH4428> the king יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <WH3478> of Israel אֶל־ <WH413> to אֲמַצְיָ֣הוּ <WH558> to Amaziah מֶֽלֶךְ־ <WH4428> king יְהוּדָה֮ <WH3063> of Judah לֵאמֹר֒ <WH559> saying הַח֜וֹחַ <WH2336> The thistle אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which בַּלְּבָנ֗וֹן <WH3844> that [was] in Lebanon שָׁ֠לַח <WH7971> sent אֶל־ <WH413> to הָאֶ֜רֶז <WH730> to the cedar אֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> which בַּלְּבָנוֹן֙ <WH3844> that [was] in Lebanon לֵאמֹ֔ר <WH559> saying תְּנָֽה־ <WH5414> Give אֶת־ <WH853> בִּתְּךָ֥ <WH1323> thy daughter לִבְנִ֖י <WH1121> to my son לְאִשָּׁ֑ה <WH802> to wife וַֽתַּעֲבֹ֞ר <WH5674> and there passed חַיַּ֤ת <WH2416> beast הַשָּׂדֶה֙ <WH7704> by a wild אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which בַּלְּבָנ֔וֹן <WH3844> that [was] in Lebanon וַתִּרְמֹ֖ס <WH7429> and trode down אֶת־ <WH853> הַחֽוֹחַ׃ <WH2336> the thistle

הַכֵּ֤ה <WH5221> Thou hast indeed הִכִּ֙יתָ֙ <WH5221> smitten אֶת־ <WH853> אֱד֔וֹם <WH123> Edom וּֽנְשָׂאֲךָ֖ <WH5375> hath lifted thee up לִבֶּ֑ךָ <WH3820> and thine heart הִכָּבֵד֙ <WH3513> glory וְשֵׁ֣ב <WH3427> [of this] and tarry בְּבֵיתֶ֔ךָ <WH1004> at home וְלָ֤מָּה <WH4100> why תִתְגָּרֶה֙ <WH1624> for why shouldest thou meddle בְּרָעָ֔ה <WH7451> to [thy] hurt וְנָ֣פַלְתָּ֔ה <WH5307> that thou shouldest fall אַתָּ֖ה <WH859> you וִיהוּדָ֥ה <WH3063> [even] thou and Judah עִמָּֽךְ׃ <WH5973> with

וְלֹא־ <WH3808> not שָׁמַ֣ע <WH8085> would not hear אֲמַצְיָ֔הוּ <WH558> But Amaziah וַיַּ֨עַל <WH5927> went up יְהוֹאָ֤שׁ <WH3060> Therefore Jehoash מֶֽלֶךְ־ <WH4428> king יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <WH3478> of Israel וַיִּתְרָא֣וּ <WH7200> looked פָנִ֔ים <WH6440> one another in the face ה֖וּא <WH1931> and he וַאֲמַצְיָ֣הוּ <WH558> and he and Amaziah מֶֽלֶךְ־ <WH4428> king יְהוּדָ֑ה <WH3063> of Judah בְּבֵ֥ית שֶׁ֖מֶשׁ <WH1053> at Bethshemesh אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which לִיהוּדָֽה׃ <WH3063> which [belongeth] to Judah

וַיִּנָּ֥גֶף <WH5062> was put to the worse יְהוּדָ֖ה <WH3063> And Judah לִפְנֵ֣י <WH6440> before יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> Israel וַיָּנֻ֖סוּ <WH5127> and they fled אִ֥ישׁ <WH376> every man [לְאָהֳלֹו כ] (לְאֹהָלָֽיו׃ <WH168> tent ק)

וְאֵת֩ <WH853> אֲמַצְיָ֨הוּ <WH558> Amaziah מֶֽלֶךְ־ <WH4428> king יְהוּדָ֜ה <WH3063> of Judah בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son יְהוֹאָ֣שׁ <WH3060> And Jehoash בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son אֲחַזְיָ֗הוּ <WH274> of Ahaziah תָּפַ֛שׂ <WH8610> took יְהוֹאָ֥שׁ <WH3060> of Jehoash מֶֽלֶךְ־ <WH4428> king יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> of Israel בְּבֵ֣ית שָׁ֑מֶשׁ <WH1053> at Bethshemesh [וַיָּבֹאוּ כ] (וַיָּבֹא֙ <WH935> abide ק) יְר֣וּשָׁלִַ֔ם <WH3389> to Jerusalem וַיִּפְרֹץ֩ <WH6555> and brake down בְּחוֹמַ֨ת <WH2346> the wall יְרוּשָׁלִַ֜ם <WH3389> of Jerusalem בְּשַׁ֤עַר <WH8179> from the gate אֶפְרַ֙יִם֙ <WH669> of Ephraim עַד־ <WH5704> against שַׁ֣עַר <WH8179> gate הַפִּנָּ֔ה <WH6438> unto the corner אַרְבַּ֥ע <WH702> four מֵא֖וֹת <WH3967> hundred אַמָּֽה׃ <WH520> cubits

וְלָקַ֣ח <WH3947> And he took אֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all הַזָּהָב־ <WH2091> all the gold וְ֠הַכֶּסֶף <WH3701> and silver וְאֵ֨ת <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> and all הַכֵּלִ֜ים <WH3627> and all the vessels הַנִּמְצְאִ֣ים <WH4672> that were found בֵּית־ <WH1004> in the house יְהוָ֗ה <WH3069> God וּבְאֹֽצְרוֹת֙ <WH214> and in the treasures בֵּ֣ית <WH1004> house הַמֶּ֔לֶךְ <WH4428> of the king's וְאֵ֖ת <WH853> בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> afflicted הַתַּֽעֲרֻב֑וֹת <WH8594> the hostages וַיָּ֖שָׁב <WH7725> and returned שֹׁמְרֽוֹנָה׃ <WH8111> to Samaria

וְיֶתֶר֩ <WH3499> Now the rest דִּבְרֵ֨י <WH1697> of the acts יְהוֹאָ֜שׁ <WH3060> of Jehoash אֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> which עָשָׂה֙ <WH6213> which he did וּגְב֣וּרָת֔וֹ <WH1369> and his might וַאֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> and how נִלְחַ֔ם <WH3898> and how he fought עִ֖ם <WH5973> with אֲמַצְיָ֣הוּ <WH558> with Amaziah מֶֽלֶךְ־ <WH4428> king יְהוּדָ֑ה <WH3063> of Judah הֲלֹא־ <WH3808> not הֵ֣ם <WH1992> like כְּתוּבִ֗ים <WH3789> [are] they not written עַל־ <WH5921> in סֵ֛פֶר <WH5612> in the book דִּבְרֵ֥י <WH1697> of the acts הַיָּמִ֖ים <WH3117> age לְמַלְכֵ֥י <WH4428> of the kings יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> Israel

וַיִּשְׁכַּ֤ב <WH7901> slept יְהוֹאָשׁ֙ <WH3060> And Jehoash עִם־ <WH5973> with אֲבֹתָ֔יו <WH1> with his fathers וַיִּקָּבֵר֙ <WH6912> and was buried בְּשֹׁ֣מְר֔וֹן <WH8111> in Samaria עִ֖ם <WH5973> with מַלְכֵ֣י <WH4428> with the kings יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> of Israel וַיִּמְלֹ֛ךְ <WH4427> reigned יָרָבְעָ֥ם <WH3379> and Jeroboam בְּנ֖וֹ <WH1121> his son תַּחְתָּֽיו׃ <WH8478> his place פ

וַיְחִ֨י <WH2421> lived אֲמַצְיָ֤הוּ <WH558> And Amaziah בֶן־ <WH1121> the son יוֹאָשׁ֙ <WH3101> of Joash מֶ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> king יְהוּדָ֔ה <WH3063> of Judah אַֽחֲרֵ֣י <WH310> after מ֔וֹת <WH4194> the death יְהוֹאָ֥שׁ <WH3060> of Jehoash בֶּן־ <WH1121> son יְהֽוֹאָחָ֖ז <WH3059> of Jehoahaz מֶ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> king יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> of Israel חֲמֵ֥שׁ <WH2568> fif עֶשְׂרֵ֖ה <WH6240> teen שָׁנָֽה׃ <WH8141> years

וְיֶ֖תֶר <WH3499> And the rest דִּבְרֵ֣י <WH1697> of the acts אֲמַצְיָ֑הוּ <WH558> of Amaziah הֲלֹא־ <WH3808> not הֵ֣ם <WH1992> like כְּתוּבִ֗ים <WH3789> [are] they not written עַל־ <WH5921> in סֵ֛פֶר <WH5612> in the book דִּבְרֵ֥י <WH1697> of the acts הַיָּמִ֖ים <WH3117> age לְמַלְכֵ֥י <WH4428> of the kings יְהוּדָֽה׃ <WH3063> Judah

וַיִּקְשְׁר֨וּ <WH7194> Now they made עָלָ֥יו <WH5921> against קֶ֛שֶׁר <WH7195> a conspiracy בִּירוּשָׁלִַ֖ם <WH3389> against him in Jerusalem וַיָּ֣נָס <WH5127> and he fled לָכִ֑ישָׁה <WH3923> to Lachish וַיִּשְׁלְח֤וּ <WH7971> but they sent אַֽחֲרָיו֙ <WH310> after לָכִ֔ישָׁה <WH3923> him to Lachish וַיְמִתֻ֖הוּ <WH4191> and slew שָֽׁם׃ <WH8033> there

וַיִּשְׂא֥וּ <WH5375> And they brought אֹת֖וֹ <WH853> עַל־ <WH5921> on הַסּוּסִ֑ים <WH5483> him on horses וַיִּקָּבֵ֧ר <WH6912> and he was buried בִּירוּשָׁלִַ֛ם <WH3389> at Jerusalem עִם־ <WH5973> with אֲבֹתָ֖יו <WH1> with his fathers בְּעִ֥יר <WH5892> in the city דָּוִֽד׃ <WH1732> of David

וַיִּקְח֞וּ <WH3947> took כָּל־ <WH3605> All עַ֤ם <WH5971> And all the people יְהוּדָה֙ <WH3063> of Judah אֶת־ <WH853> עֲזַרְיָ֔ה <WH5838> Azariah וְה֕וּא <WH1931> who בֶּן־ <WH1121> old שֵׁ֥שׁ <WH8337> six עֶשְׂרֵ֖ה <WH6240> teen שָׁנָ֑ה <WH8141> years וַיַּמְלִ֣כוּ <WH4427> and made him king אֹת֔וֹ <WH853> תַּ֖חַת <WH8478> the place אָבִ֥יו <WH1> instead of his father אֲמַצְיָֽהוּ׃ <WH558> Amaziah

ה֚וּא <WH1931> He בָּנָ֣ה <WH1129> He built אֶת־ <WH853> אֵילַ֔ת <WH359> Elath וַיְשִׁבֶ֖הָ <WH7725> and restored לִֽיהוּדָ֑ה <WH3063> it to Judah אַחֲרֵ֥י <WH310> after שְׁכַֽב־ <WH7901> slept הַמֶּ֖לֶךְ <WH4428> that the king עִם־ <WH5973> with אֲבֹתָֽיו׃ <WH1> with his fathers פ

בִּשְׁנַת֙ <WH8141> year חֲמֵשׁ־ <WH2568> fif עֶשְׂרֵ֣ה <WH6240> teen שָׁנָ֔ה <WH8141> years לַאֲמַצְיָ֥הוּ <WH558> of Amaziah בֶן־ <WH1121> the son יוֹאָ֖שׁ <WH3101> of Joash מֶ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> king יְהוּדָ֑ה <WH3063> of Judah מָ֠לַךְ <WH4427> began to reign יָרָבְעָ֨ם <WH3379> Jeroboam בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son יוֹאָ֤שׁ <WH3101> of Joash מֶֽלֶךְ־ <WH4428> king יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <WH3478> of Israel בְּשֹׁ֣מְר֔וֹן <WH8111> in Samaria אַרְבָּעִ֥ים <WH705> [and reigned] forty וְאַחַ֖ת <WH259> and one שָׁנָֽה׃ <WH8141> years

וַיַּ֥עַשׂ <WH6213> And he did הָרַ֖ע <WH7451> [that which was] evil בְּעֵינֵ֣י <WH5869> in the sight יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> of the LORD לֹ֣א <WH3808> did not סָ֗ר <WH5493> he departed מִכָּל־ <WH3605> all חַטֹּאות֙ <WH2403> not from all the sins יָרָבְעָ֣ם <WH3379> of Jeroboam בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son נְבָ֔ט <WH5028> of Nebat אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which הֶחֱטִ֖יא <WH2398> to sin אֶת־ <WH853> יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> who made Israel
